title: Create Service with Session Affinity
description: Create a Service named ||sticky-svc|| that exposes the ||web-deploy|| Deployment with session affinity set to ||ClientIP|| in the ||venus|| namespace.

steps: kubectl expose deployment web-deploy --name=sticky-svc --port=80 -n venus --dry-run=client -o yaml > sticky-svc.yaml

validations.command: kubectl get service sticky-svc -n venus -o jsonpath='{.spec.sessionAffinity}'
validations.description: Service should have ClientIP session affinity
